places_with_reviews.name: Ketki Wadi Beach Resort
address: Anjarle, Dapoli, R3XQ+X4J, Ratnagiri, Anjarle, Maharashtra 415714, India

reviews.text: Too much hope less Hotel. Low quality veg and non veg food. Too late service to serve food. I am suggesting, if you want to enjoy your Holiday, then don't stay in this hotel.

Rooms are ok, the beach and resort location is wonderful,
The only complaint is about the service, especially when serving dinner.
No management at all.
They didn't have a clue how to manage such a crowd.
For peak season , let say, if the resort has 100 rooms and you imagine 4 to 5 people living in each room, then resort should be able to manage food for 400 to 500 people.
We had to cancel our order and at the end we were force to take tali.
We gave order at 8:17 PM and we took tali at 22:34, more than 2 hours our order was not entertained, and in between we went there to enquire many time in kitchen.

Pathetic experience in my life for this resort. Unhygienic rooms, bedsheets worst, not properly clean. Worst experience of lifetime. Food taste not good, staff very rude. The owner does not even bother if the customer is getting everything properly on time. The staff treats the customer as if the customer has done something wrong . I would suggest please do not choose this resort even if photos on Google are good. Please do not book the resort before checking. There are lot many resorts which charge you less but service is awesome but here charges are as if it's a 5 star resort and service is worst. Overall the resort, the staff and the owner are pathetic. Worst experience of life😡😡😡

Dining should be improve by regularly cleaning and much more or they have to dine in the rooms on there own.
Chicken thali I have try but it should have to improve its taste food quality is quite good
Fish price is high but quality matters.
Rooms are very nice but they have to adjust there price by the people needs.

Good and reasonable place to stay. All basic amenities are available at the resort. Host is very cooperative and helpful.
Anjarle beach is beautiful beach.  Resort is on the beach. Beach is very clean.  AC room cottage are available. Room size is comfortable for 3-4 persons. Charges are 2500 on week days.  Advised to visit on week days for conformable stay.

places_with_reviews.name: SaffronStays Villa 270°, Dapoli
address: Harnai-Palande Rd, Bazar Mohalla, Harnai, Pandhari, Maharashtra 415713, India

reviews.text:
I want to take a moment to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional experience at Villa 270. Everything about it was simply perfect.
The location was ideal, offering breathtaking views and a serene atmosphere. I cherished every moment spent there, often finding solace in the solitude it provided. Sharing photos with my family and friends allowed me to relive those beautiful memories with them.
The location of the rooms was so exceptional that I could see the ocean from my room, making it hard to tear oneself away from the mesmerizing scenery.
The culinary experience was truly remarkable. The food was not only delicious but also a learning opportunity for me. I discovered a newfound appreciation for carbohydrates and indulged more than I care to admit.

Villa 270 is an amazing property with amazing views, literally 270 degree views. Villas are sea facing. Lush green with stone carved statues.
Pros:
Breathtaking views
Beautiful sunset
Good food
Best room service
Cozy rooms with antiques
Shower was made of stones
Good WiFi
Cons:
Music is played in full volume in nearby villages all the time 24x7.
The nearest beach is a 20min drive.
No cell connectivity

Avoid visiting if you have elders as it has many stairs to climb to the villa.
Avoid if looking for peace of mind as loud music can irritate you.

This was my first experience with saffron stays and I must tell you it's awesome ! The hospitality of the staff, the food , the vibe! Everything here was excellent. The location and views from the room will make you feel connected to the sea. You have the ocean view from everywhere because the villa is built on a mountain top. Special thanks to the entire staff and chef Mangesh for the absolutely amazing quality of food. All the dishes we ordered were so delicious! The staff also arranged an auto for us to travel locally. They are very helpful. Hygiene and everything was on point ! If you go, don't forget to taste their "ukdiche modak"!
Overall I will suggest it to everyone who wants to spend some enriching time with friends and family.
Do visit Anjarle beach, a lovely white sand beach which is 15-20 mins from the resort.

Amazing location, easy to reach, calm and relaxing atmosphere and amazing experience.

Location wise and view wise it is just amazing and one of its kind. Amazing sunsets, dont miss at any cost.

Cost wise comes to a premium category but lacks services equivalent to it. No welcome drinks, No Complimentary breakfast, no additonal services like pick up n drop services and not even a persons to attend and pick your baggage. (You have to pay extra for all these or you are not offered)

Phone conversations are professional yet lack empathy, no suggestions over the local cuisine, no suggestions to nearby tourist attraction, no suggestions for local food and market place, “when asked specifically”.

Villa 270 Degrees Superb and peaceful Locations
We had Ex employees REUNION at this wonderful Villa surrounded by Sea Coast Breezy and Enjoyable indeed.
Very delicious food ,well maintained clean and luxury rooms
and above all Courteous staff willing to go extra mile to ensure Customer delight
Highly recommendable for availing and experiencing it

places_with_reviews.name: Exotica Suvarna Samudra - Sea View Resort Dapoli
address: Bypass Road, Harnai, Dapoli, Maharashtra 415713, India

reviews.text:
This property is now managed by Lemon Tree. Was here with friends on 2024 Holi long weekend and paid quite a hefty amount for 2 nights. It was a below average experience overall. The staff is new. They go back to manager to check for everything we asked for!!! The food is below average. They did not have ice available with them for 2 day!! The pool is average. The drinks counter near the pool is closed. The rooftop pub and the spa is closed. Property is located quite far from the beach. Only the view is good from the rooms if you choose to ignore the garbage lying on the hill below. Initially they gave us room on ground floor which had smell in washroom. We had to change our rooms. The breakfast is again below average. The property is off from the main road and it is a steep climb to the gate.

Overall if you just want to relax and take rest in the rooms with occasional tour to the beach by car and also getting the rooms at Rs. 3000 approx. with breakfast then this is good otherwise can be skipped.

I think it's the best option to stay with family, including an elderly person. Nice location, on hill top, overlooking the a small town and clear wide view of Arabian sea, almost, 180 degrees view. Staffs there are young, energetic and very friendly. Response time is very quick. Property is also well equipped with all required things, restaurant again is like dinning next to sea, nice open well lighted. Full marks to location, ambience, staffs. Overall, a great place to stay and relax.

It's on a hill overlooking the ocean. Good view but not the best. Its taken over by Lemon Tree Hotels so somethings were not operational like pool when we went.
Rooms are really nice and service was excellent. Food especially breakfast options could be better.
Its little far from main nodes of the town and cell network is zero there throughout the 15-20 kms radius.
The location is very nice...! Rooms are also clean and maintained . Mr. Thapa and other staff are also good .. only thing they need to improve is quality and variety of food.

I had a pleasant experience at this hotel. The rooms were comfortable and offered beautiful sea views. However, there were ongoing renovations within the hotel premises. Unfortunately, I was not impressed with their restaurant as the food was not fresh, service very slow and quite expensive.

places_with_reviews.name: Whistling Waves Beach Resort
address: Savane Beach, Anjarle - Aade Rd, Dapoli, Tadachakond, Maharashtra 415714, India

reviews.text: This could be one of the best stays in that belt or in Anjarle at least. Beach side location is most attractive. Rooms are just average, good coastal cuisine with not much variety but staff is friendly and cordial. Overall decent and comfortable stay for couples or families.

We stayed for 2 nights. We liked everything about the resort right from the rooms, service, surroundings and food. A clean private-type beach nearby makes this resort stand out. This is a great place especially if you are on a digital detox getaway as there is no network in the surrounding areas. The resort does have a wifi though which is good enough to make phone calls. The local people in the surrounding areas were very warm, affectionate and hospitable. We had a car breakdown and the resort staff along with local people were selfless while helping us. We would surely visit here again.

Mixed review 3.5-3.8/5...good place if you have your own large group
1. Decent rooms
2. Excellent service
3. Beach nearby with very little crowd
Can improve on food taste consistency.
Also lawn needs improvement,
Cleanliness can be better in common areas
Charges are on higher side as compared to facilities. Can do better on that front
Good ppl

We stayed at Whistling Waves Resort for a delightful three-night getaway. The rooms were impeccably clean and maintained to the highest standards of hygiene. What truly sets this place apart is the serene atmosphere and the added bonus of having the beach just a mere 150 meters away from the resort.

One of the standout features of this resort is its pet-friendly policy, and they charge a nominal fee for them. Our girl had a fantastic time here and even made a new friend - Milli.

The food at Whistling Waves Resort deserves special mention; we tasted all their thalis - the fish, chicken, vegetarian, and egg options. Make sure to place your food orders in advance as the food is made fresh.  The real charm of this place is having the entire beach practically to yourself, as it's blissfully unburdened by hordes of tourists or locals. If you're someone who relishes peace and seclusion, this destination is tailor-made for you.

The staff at the resort are exceptionally friendly and always ready to assist with any requests. The property is beautifully landscaped and exceptionally well-maintained. Ample parking space with secure gates ensures that you won't have to worry about your vehicle's safety.

Our stay at Whistling Waves Resort was a tranquil and rejuvenating experience and would definitely visit again in future. We wholeheartedly recommend this  place to everyone seeking a peaceful retreat away from the bustling crowds.

I visited Whistling Waves resort recently.
It was a very nice place, it is good for families as well as bachelors.
The beach is just a min away from this place, you can see beach view from the first floor rooms.
The food quality is very nice. Veg and nonveg available, specially fish thalis are very nice. They also provid barbeque if you want.
The service is good, Vijay is the person who was serving us was amazing.
Overall a very good experience we had at Whistling Waves resort.

places_with_reviews.name: Lemon Tree Hotel Dapoli
address: Bypass Road, Harnai, Dapoli, Maharashtra 415713, India

reviews.text: My stay at Lemon Tree Hotel Dapoli was really enjoyable! The hotel is surrounded by lots of trees, which makes it feel really calm and quiet. The rooms are nice and big, and the beds are comfortable. I loved waking up in the morning and looking out at the beautiful sea, which is rare to see anywhere else. The breakfast they gave us was really tasty, with lots of things to eat. Requires to travel extra 2km which I think totally worth as we also get view from the top of the Harnai, beach & fort in a single frame & attaching more photos. I had such a nice experience there, and I'll consider another visit soon.

Overall, a pleasant stay. The location was convenient, close to many attractions. The room was comfortable, although it could have been a bit cleaner. The staff were friendly. The breakfast buffet had a good selection, but it was crowded during peak hours. Decent value for the price

Upon arrival, I was greeted by the warm and friendly staff who ensured a seamless check-in process. The hotel's aesthetic charm immediately caught my eye, with its tastefully decorated interiors and lush green surroundings.

The room provided a cozy sanctuary, impeccably clean and thoughtfully appointed with all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay. The plush bedding ensured a restful night's sleep, while the picturesque views from the window added to the overall ambiance.

One of the highlights of my stay was the delectable dining experience at the hotel's restaurant. From traditional Konkani delicacies to continental fare, the menu offered a diverse range of culinary delights to tantalize the taste buds. The attentive service and scenic backdrop made each meal a memorable affair.

For those seeking relaxation, the hotel's spa facilities provided the perfect escape.

Perched atop a scenic hilltop, this hotel boasts breathtaking sea views that are simply unparalleled. From the moment you step into the lobby, you're greeted by a sense of tranquility and elegance that sets the tone for your stay. The well-appointed rooms offer panoramic vistas of the azure waters, providing a constant reminder of the beauty that surrounds you.

One of the standout features of this hotel is its impressive swimming pool, which not only offers a refreshing respite from the sun but also overlooks the shimmering sea below. Whether you're lounging by the poolside  or taking a leisurely swim, the experience is nothing short of sublime.

However, what truly sets this hotel apart is its exceptional staff. From the warm welcome at check-in to the attentive service throughout your stay, every member of the team goes above and beyond to ensure your comfort and satisfaction. Whether you need recommendations for local attractions or assistance with any requests, the staff is always ready to assist with a smile.

Overall, this hotel on the hill with its stunning sea view, inviting swimming pool, and exemplary staff is a true gem that promises an unforgettable stay for anyone seeking a slice of paradise.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Lemon Tree Hotel, and it was an experience worth sharing. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted by a vibrant and inviting atmosphere. The staff were incredibly welcoming and efficient, making check-in a breeze.

The room itself was spacious, clean, and well-equipped with all the amenities one could need for a comfortable stay. The bed was plush and provided a restful night's sleep, while the modern bathroom added a touch of luxury to the experience.

places_with_reviews.name: Appa's Beach Resort
address: Padale Beach Rd, Near swami vivekand pratikruti, Padale, Maharashtra 415714, India

reviews.text:
Food Quality: The resort offers a decent variety of dishes with generally good taste. While it might not reach the culinary heights of higher-end resorts, the meals are satisfying and cater to a diverse palate.

**Location:** The resort's location is convenient, providing easy access to nearby attractions. Whether it's a beach, cultural sites, or shopping areas, the resort is strategically situated for guests to explore the surroundings.

**Service:** The staff is generally attentive and friendly, creating a welcoming atmosphere. However, occasional inconsistencies may be observed, with service levels varying depending on the specific team or time of day.

**Room:** The rooms are clean and comfortable, meeting the expectations of a 3-star resort. While not overly luxurious, they provide a cozy and functional space for guests to unwind after a day of activities.

The resort is right next to the beach and rooms have very basic setup but otherwise clean. Not very lavish but okay okay arrangements . The food they serve is tasty and the service is good. The road to this resort is very narrow and at a time only one car can go. 5 star for service. We were 5 friends visiting and a dog there joined us and was with us till we left the place. Shall visit again.

It's kind of a home stay and don't go by the word Resort 😄
It is a hidden gem, a must visit place. The beach view from the room is just awesome. The staff cook the food very tasty, a very peaceful place without any interference or disturbance around.

One of the best resorts to stay for those who want to feel and experience the real beauty of nature from an excellent beach face room.

Must try if you are a foodie and love to have real kokani taste.

Serene area, rooms only for bed + to get fresh.
Food awesome..sea shore and greenery is the real ambience.

address: Ashoka Water Park & Resort, At Post Harnai, Near Vakdi Bhend Road, Harnai, Dapoli, Harnai, Maharashtra 415713, India

reviews.text: Worst experience  ever  at ashoka water park  . The rides were good but the staff was rude and non cooperative.  The manager   named pednekar was rude and didn't  allow  us to do the things which were avaliable. The water was unclean and there were lot of shells there. There wasn't  light in the room and the room was not that great .the service was  also  not that great. And there were a lot of mosquitoes  there . Worst experience ever  I and my family had

Hotel is nice as well rooms but the hotel staff was very rude and their food was also not fine, we visit with the group of 60 people but hotel chief made worst food on that day and we eated outside at that night and payed for that worst food

Rooms were good and clean suitable for 3 adults and 2 kids
Food is clean,good. Food felt overpriced for me.
Water resort is good and maintened and prices are less kids enjoyed a lot.
Staff - is very supportive I will give five star for staff.
Price - are bit higher but may be due to holiday period.
Manager is kind and supportive. Staff is also helpful. Resort location is precious.
Food is average but rooms and place is awesome

places_with_reviews.name: Prime Beach Resort

reviews.text:
We recently visited Anjarle, and we had a stay in Prime Beach Resort. It's an awesome place, it is located just near the sea, best room service. I feel that this resort is the best choice if you are visiting this place.

The food is really very tasty, but you need to tell them in advance about the food. Locality is very good and the place is also maintained nicely. Lot of efforts are been taken to give the customers the best experience.

I have a small suggestion, it would be nice if there is a mosquito net door attached to the balcony doors, so that we can keep the room ventilated.

If you visit this place, please do not miss the dolphin ride! It's a very nice experience of sailing into the sea for an hour watching dolphins.

The room was right opposite the beach,amazing view but it needs maintenance as the name says resort and not home stay. The beds had cigarette holes, and n fan was full of dust. No wardrobe , no mirror in the room.

Awesome place... Beach accessible right in front of the resort... Scenic view... Cool and quiet atmosphere.

We asked the owner to cook the food... That too was cooked at a reasonable price... Also the cooked food had an authentic Konkani taste...

Best place to stay in Anjarle. It's right opposite to the Anjarle Beach. Rooms are well maintained and clean. The place is run by Kelaskar family. All are very cooperative and helpful. They prefer families to stay at their resort. Food served is absolutely delicious - Bhendi fry, Ghavan Chutney, and all other veg delicacies. You can buy fish from Harne port and they will cook for you at a cost 400/kg. Konkani style fish fry and curry is just lovely. Superb location and stay for family trip. I will surely visit again.
Anjarle's hidden gem! Prime Beach Resort is totally worth your time. Quiet spot, incredible beach views, and Aditya's top-notch hospitality. Every visit here is as mesmerizing as the last.

places_with_reviews.name: SagarSparsha
address: Padale, Bhandarwada, Dapoli, Padale, Maharashtra 415714, India

reviews.text:
Beach front property with affordable cost.

Don't expect hotel like hospitality but service is good enough with respect to the costing.

We did found some good reviews about food but we found it bit higher than average. On making complaint about lunch preparation then definitely showed improvement in dinner preparation.

They take 400 per kg cooking charges for fish that we can buy from Harne port which is approx 10 km away.

Parking space is available to accommodate 4-5 cars.

Very beautiful place, great ambience, lovely authentic kokani food and great host. A must visit if you're looking for a place away from chaos and crowd, with your close friends or partner. Amazing beach from near Sagar sparsha hotel great ful beach and hotel.❤️

Excellent place for relaxing. Must visit by group who really want peace.
Specious & clean sea facing rooms.
Newly constructed hotel with affordable rate.
Delicious food with Best room service.
Less crowded beach..feels like just a private beach.
Caretaker Mr.Pravin is so much helpful

Seaside accommodation with excellent hospitality and well-maintained rooms. The food is also noteworthy. A tip: Bring your own fish before check-in, as there are no nearby options for purchase. They charge 400 INR per kilogram to cook it. Additionally, grocery shops are a considerable distance away from the location.
The hotel location is superb. The beach is beautiful and very clean.

places_with_reviews.name: Mallhar Cottages
address: Plot No 15, Sr.No 25/1/41 Murdi, Tal, Dapoli, Maharashtra 415714, India

reviews.text: We were in the deluxe rooms which were excellent. Location -wise, it is far from the beach and you have to inform the restaurant well in advance at what time you'll want breakfast and what you'll be eating. The staff is very caring and helpful.

A very quiet and serene place, 15mins from Anjarle beach. I personally like the property, it's clean , has all facilities, location is good and on top of everything food is fantastic.
Mr. Vivek , the host is helpful and understanding , and in the property u will meet Mr. Pankaj who is one of the sweetest person I have met 😁
You get the best food here in the adjoining restaurant Varad Aamrai, and Mr. Pankaj makes sure to arrange evrything that u would want to have.
The food served here is THE BEST in the area.
Overall the hospitality is top-notch .
It would be a good decision booking this property 😁

Location is good , tariff is reasonable , we liked the place but out of 3 nights we stayed 3rd night experience was horrible.
If you know there is electricity outage issue the owner should atleast have a disel generator as a backup. Investors run only for 1 or 2 hours .

Rooms are not well maintained, no knob for fan it runs on slow speed, lot of bugs.
Electricity goes lot of times and there is no generator facility.
We had booked for 3 nights 4 days out of which 3 times there was no electricity,  invertor works for few hours then it goes off . On 3rd night there was no electricity for 12 hours when complained to the owner he said we should checked out if we had problem that too at night and also abused when we asked to adjust the 3rd night tariff with food and homestay

We had paid full room tariff one day after we reached. Once we complained regarding the electricity issue owner was not picking up the phone.

We had to stay at home stay opposite it
Owner of home stay offered for help looking at our condition since we had 2 kids also with us.

Service providers are really good
But owner doesn't care about the property

My recent stay at the Malhar Cottages was a wonderful experience. The hospitality was top-notch and the staff were very friendly and accommodating. The rooms & washroom were  very clean and comfortable, and the food was amazing. I had a great meal at the restaurant during my stay, everything was nicely cooked and presented. The menu had a nice variety of food to choose from, and they even had a few specialities that I had never tried before. The desserts were especially delicious. All in all, I had a great experience, and I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a pleasant stay.

We have stayed 2 nights in the top AC room, the feel of room & view was amazing. From top room you get the Sea view.
It rained during our visit which attracted some insects but after few hours all was normal.
I feel the top room washroom can be more cleaned but it was manageable.
Since it is lil far from beach you will find peaceful surroundings.
Pajpandhari Sunset point was amazing.
Sharing some clicks to help.
Enjoy :)
